attributes.action: Allow people with type 1 diabetes to join the army.
attributes.additional_details: I believe the government should take this action because, diabetic people can serve maybe not in frontline roles but nonetheless can still and are able to serve in some other roles
attributes.background: I would like the government to consider what roles diabetic people could perform within the army

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition, which calls for similar action: "Diabetes should not prevent someone serving in the British armed forces" https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/741445
